H0.text: what was the religion in persia before islam. Manichaeism

H1.text: what was the religion in persia before islam. Mithraism

H2.text: what was the religion in persia before islam. Buddhism

H3.text: what was the religion in persia before islam. Zoroastrian

A4.text: Zoroastrianism was the official religion of successive Iranian polities, beginning with the Achaemenid Empire and ending with the Sasanian Empire, which revitalized the faith and standardized its teachings.

A5.text: Manichaeism was heavily inspired by Zoroastrianism because of Mani's Iranian origin, and it was also rooted in prior Middle-Eastern Gnostic beliefs.
